summary: A small-town waitress vies with a sassy city slicker for the attention of the town's most eligible bachelor.
cast: Marla Sokoloff|Jennifer Tilly|Monika Schnarre|Dave Thomas|Jonathan Cherry|Marnie Alton|Barry Watson|Peter Benson|Kee Chan|Len Doncheff|Aaron Grain|Jesse Moss|Alvin Sanders|Frank C. Turner|Matthew Safran|Yvette Yip
title: Love on the Side
